meanings.definition: A hot dog topped with chili.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat a chilidog at the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: The food truck sells delicious chilidogs with extra cheese.
meanings.sent3: At the cookout, everyone wanted a chilidog, but there was only one left!
meanings.sent4: The chilidog was a flavor explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The chilidog was so messy, chili dripped down my chin.

meanings.definition: To top a hot dog with chili.
meanings.sent1: I always chilidog my hot dogs for a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: When you chilidog your hot dog, it becomes a whole new meal.
meanings.sent3: My friend likes to chilidog his hot dog with extra jalapenos.
meanings.sent4: She decided to chilidog her hot dog after trying a bite of mine.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to chilidog your hot dog before adding the onions.
